introduction.introductiondescription:
# Introduction
 You can manage(retrieve, add, update, delete and export) items and permissions, also can perform special operations of groups and users in Bold BI Cloud using the REST API. To access the following API's you need the Bold BI Cloud version 2.3 and above.

 Also we have an API's to manage(retrieve, add, update and delete) groups and users.

authentication.getauthenticationdescription: When you sign in to the Bold BI Cloud, an authentication token is provided that should be attached in the request header(Authorization) for all subsequent API calls to authenticate the requests.

permissiondescription.getpermissiondescription: To retrieve a list of permissions, create and delete a particular permission in the Bold BI Cloud, use the corresponding endpoints below.

groupdescription.getgroupsdescription: To add and delete a list of users in particular group from the Bold BI Cloud, use the corresponding endpoints below.

userdescription.getusersdescription: To retrieve a list of groups of particular user, add csv users, download csv templates in the Bold BI Cloud, use the corresponding endpoints below.

categorydescription.getcategorydescription: To create and modify a particular category in the Bold BI Cloud, use the corresponding endpoints below.

dashboarddescription.getdashboarddescription: To copy, retrieve, and export dashboards in the Bold BI Cloud, use the corresponding endpoints below.

itemdescription.getitemdescription: To retrieve a list of items, retrieve, delete a particular item, and check a particular item name in the Bold BI Cloud, use the corresponding endpoints below.

tryitnow.tryitnowdescription:
Interactive documentation lets you play with our APIs to explore the responses and make the plan accordingly.

[Try It Now(v2.0)](/cloud-bi/rest-api-reference/v2.0/try-it-now/)

 To know about how it works, please click [here](/cloud-bi/rest-api-reference/interact-with-rest-api/).
